snippet: Ford, one of three automakers to announce vehicle recalls, said none of the defects had resulted in accidents or injuries.
abstract: Ford says it is recalling nearly 1.4 million vehicles from 2013-2014 model years for air bag malfunction and door handles that may not latch properly; insists none of defects have resulted in accidents or injuries.
lead_paragraph: Ford, one of three automakers to announce vehicle recalls, said none of the defects had resulted in accidents or injuries.

headline.main: Ford Recalls Vehicles for Air Bag Flaw
headline.print_headline: Ford Recalls Vehicles for Air Bag Flaw
